section.title: What is Lex Machina?
section.p: Lex Machina provides Legal Analytics® to law firms and companies, providing you the tools you can use to craft successful strategies, win cases, and close business. Lex Machina mines litigation data, revealing insights about judges, law firms, lawyers, parties, and case subjects themselves, culled from millions of pages of litigation information. Because analytics involve the discovery and communication of meaningful patterns in data, these insights are called "Legal Analytics".

title.#text: How Does Lex Machina Work with
